name: Alone (itch) (HackTrout)
description:
You find yourself alone in a pitch black world, well, at least you think you're alone.

This is a survival game but with only one inventory slot, any items left in the dark are lost forever. Let's see who's able to climb the tech tree the fastest!

Windows only. WASD to move and shift to sprint. Left click to harvest, attack and craft. Right click to gather and place items.

Solo developed by HackTrout.
